Uses of Class
the_Manor.Item

  • Packages that use Item 
    Package Description
    the_Manor  

    • Uses of Item in the_Manor

      Subclasses of Item in the_Manor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Key
      This class represents a key opening a door.
      class  Potion
      This class represents the food available in the game.
      class  Shield
      A shield can be found by a player in a room or given by an ally.
      class  Weapon
      A weapon can be found by a player in a room or given by an ally.
      Methods in the_Manor that return Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item Ally.getItem()
      This method allows to know the item given by the ally
      Methods in the_Manor with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Room.addItem(Item item)
      Allows to add an item in the room.
      void Ally.addItem(Item item)
      Allows to add an item to an ally If an ally already possesses an item, an another item cannot be added
      boolean Player.haveItem(Item item)
      Allows to know if the player have a specific item
      void Player.pickUp(Item item)
      This method allows to pick up an item in the room It adds the item once to the inventory It can't add the same item (ID) two times to the inventory.
      void Room.removeItem(Item item)
      Allows to remove an item from the room.
      Constructors in the_Manor with parameters of type Item 
      Constructor and Description
      Ally(java.lang.String newName, java.lang.String description, Item item)
      This is the Ally constructor
